items.name: Pizza Margherita
items.description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.description: Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Classic salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

items.name: Chicken Parmesan
items.description: Breaded chicken cutlets topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Hamburger
items.description: Classic beef burger served with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles on a bun.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Crispy deep-fried potato fries seasoned with salt.

items.name: Fish and Chips
items.description: Battered and deep-fried fish fillets served with crispy potato chips.

items.name: Mushroom Risotto
items.description: Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with mushrooms, onions, and Parmesan cheese.

items.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
items.description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a tortilla.

items.name: BBQ Ribs
items.description: Slow-cooked pork ribs glazed with barbecue sauce.

items.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
items.description: Assorted vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.

items.name: Shrimp Scampi
items.description: Garlic butter shrimp served over a bed of pasta.

items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: Beef burger topped with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion on a bun.

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Creamy pasta dish made with chicken, Alfredo sauce, and Parmesan cheese.

items.name: Caprese Salad
items.description: Fresh salad made with tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and balsamic glaze.

items.name: Chicken Teriyaki Bowl
items.description: Grilled chicken served over steamed rice with teriyaki sauce and vegetables.

items.name: Margherita Panini
items.description: Italian sandwich made with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and pesto on ciabatta bread.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

items.name: Steak Frites
items.description: Grilled steak served with French fries and garlic butter sauce.

items.name: Vegetarian Pizza
items.description: Pizza topped with assorted vegetables such as bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and olives.

items.name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
items.description: Garlic butter shrimp served with lemon wedges and parsley.

items.name: Vegetable Lasagna
items.description: Italian pasta dish made with layers of lasagna noodles, vegetables, marinara sauce, and cheese.

items.name: Chicken Quesadilla
items.description: Grilled chicken and cheese stuffed in a flour tortilla and served with salsa and sour cream.

items.name: Eggplant Parmesan
items.description: Breaded and fried eggplant slices topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Margarita Cocktail
items.description: Classic cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec.

items.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
items.description: Homemade soup made with chicken, vegetables, and egg noodles.

items.name: Chocolate Brownie Sundae
items.description: Warm chocolate brownie topped with vanilla ice cream, chocolate syrup, whipped cream, and a cherry.

items.name: Chicken Fajitas
items.description: Grilled chicken, bell peppers, and onions served with tortillas, salsa, and sour cream.

items.name: Cobb Salad
items.description: Salad made with mixed greens, grilled chicken, avocado, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, and blue cheese.
